scripts.go-test:
(echo '--------------------
Running tests...
--------------------

** WARNING **  This requires a reset on the db and will wipe all current data except for uhbVerses, uhbWords, uhbUnitWord, uhbUnitRange, ugntVerses, ugntWords, ugntUnitWord, ugntUnitRange, and definitions tables!
' && npm run confirm && npm run do-reset-db && mocha tests/*.test.js --require tests/hooks.js) || true
scripts.go-update-db:
(echo '--------------------
Updating database...
--------------------
' && npm run confirm && node src/db/update.js) || true
scripts.go-setup-db:
(echo '----------------------
Setting up database...
----------------------

** WARNING **  This will wipe current data!
' && npm run confirm && npm run do-setup-db && node ./src/scripts/importUHBFromUsfm.js && node ./src/scripts/populateUHBUnitWordsTable.js && node ./src/scripts/importUGNTFromUsfm.js && node ./src/scripts/populateUGNTUnitWordsTable.js) || true
scripts.go-reset-db:
(echo '-------------------------
Resetting the database...
-------------------------

** WARNING **  This will wipe all current data except for uhbVerses, uhbWords, uhbUnitWord, uhbUnitRange, ugntVerses, ugntWords, ugntUnitWord, ugntUnitRange, and definitions tables!
' && npm run confirm && npm run do-reset-db) || true
scripts.go-deploy-staging:
(echo '-----------------
Deploy staging...
-----------------
' && npm run confirm && serverless deploy --stage staging) || true
scripts.go-deploy-production:
(echo '--------------------
Deploy production...
--------------------
' && npm run confirm && serverless deploy --stage production) || true
scripts.go-update-patch:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (PATCH) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run confirm && npm i && npm version patch && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.go-update-minor:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (MINOR) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run confirm && npm i && npm version minor && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.go-update-major:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (MAJOR) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run confirm && npm i && npm version major && npm run publish-to-npm
